question:
Getting an Avocado Plant Started Remove and wash the pit. Suspend the pit in water. Place in the refrigerator, and change the water weekly. When the stem is about six inches long, cut it back. Plant your avocado pit. Water the plant frequently.Harden off the avocado plant. Pinch the leaves off after every six inches of growth.

Stop forgetting birthdays and anniversary dates. No worries. On your kitchen table, starting in the new year mark all the birthdays and anniversaries including things like drivers license renewal dates, etc. on the table top. Use a pen so it's a permanent reminder. No more forgetting important dates.
